name: workspace
author: Prosopo

scripts.clean: find . -name "node_modules" -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name "dist" -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name "package-lock.json" -type f -delete
scripts.build: npm run build:contract && npm run build:i18n && npm run build:datasets && npm run build:api && npm run build:provider && npm run build:procaptcha && npm run build:procaptcha-react
scripts.build:api: npm -w @prosopo/api run clean && npm -w @prosopo/api run build
scripts.build:contract: npm -w @prosopo/contract run clean && npm -w @prosopo/contract run build
scripts.build:provider: npm -w @prosopo/provider run clean && npm -w @prosopo/provider run build
scripts.build:procaptcha: npm -w @prosopo/procaptcha run clean && npm -w @prosopo/procaptcha run build
scripts.build:procaptcha-react: npm -w @prosopo/procaptcha-react run clean && npm -w @prosopo/procaptcha-react run build
scripts.build:datasets: npm -w @prosopo/datasets run clean && npm -w @prosopo/datasets run build
scripts.build:i18n: npm -w @prosopo/i18n run clean && npm -w @prosopo/i18n run build
scripts.test: npm run remove-test-container && docker compose --file docker-compose.test.yml up -d substrate-test-node && npm -w @prosopo/provider run test
scripts.pull: npm run git:fetch && git submodule foreach -q --recursive git pull
scripts.stash: git submodule foreach -q --recursive git stash push -m
scripts.unstash: git submodule foreach -q --recursive git stash pop
scripts.stash:drop: git submodule foreach -q --recursive git stash drop
scripts.stash:clear: git submodule foreach -q --recursive git stash drop

description: Integrates protocol and provider for development purposes
